scripts.generator: if [ ! -e index.js ] ; then echo "const sexpress = require('sexpress')() ; sexpress.run()" >> index.js ; fi
scripts.postinstall: npm run generator && npm run firstrun && npm update
scripts.server-update: git reset --hard HEAD && git pull && npm update
scripts.server-reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.server-start: pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-restart: pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-run: pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-rerun: pm2 delete BikeTag && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && npm run server-logs
scripts.server-deploy: npm run server-update && npm run server-restart && npm run server-logs
scripts.wipe: rm -rf temp lib templates public src controllers index.js app.js && (rm config/config.json || true && rm config/config.js || true )
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules config && npm run wipe && npm run server-update
